html:
8.8.18  8:15 am   gonna ask bad bad questions 'til i ruin bill's day

     i have built a pretty high tolerance

8.8.18  7:29 am   i was so freaking bored and i stumbled across your youtube and binged watch literally everything and now i'm bored again, anyways, i'm bored?

     you could check out the rest of the website

8.8.18  6:33 am   is your next song about Halloween by chance?

     no

8.8.18  5:39 am   Just curious but when do you expect the new video to be released?

     as soon as humanly possible

8.8.18  4:38 am   How do you cope with failures?

     fail bigger so the other failures look like successes, in comparison

8.8.18  3:35 am   when will you have merch i need to buy some from you

     right now go ahead

8.8.18  2:35 am   what's your opinion on NASA?

     they're out of this world

8.8.18  1:09 am   https://billwurtz.com/is.jpg why in fucks name would anyone post this to their website

     to help even the playing field

8.8.18  12:48 am   should I buy your videotapes and audio cassettes?

     i'm not selling any

8.7.18  11:24 pm   what type of person am i

     type 1

8.7.18  11:03 pm   why aren't you awake

     i am but why aren't you

8.7.18  10:27 pm   how do you spell

     with style, and grace

8.7.18  10:19 pm   Between the 2 do you consider yourself to be more of a bassist or a guitarist?

     i don't consider myself a guitarist whatsoever

8.7.18  10:16 pm   why don't you do more simple videos like new canaan?

     it's tempting but that might be terrible

8.7.18  9:13 pm   8.4.18  4:48 pm is this why you wrote the song "tuesday"?

     no

      or was that written before you decided songs are best released on tuesday

     yes. it was actually released on wednesday, because at that time i prefered to release songs on wednesday. the video, however, was released on a tuesday because i prefered to release music videos on tuesday. but it was written a year earlier when there was no weekly schedule of any kind

8.7.18  9:04 pm   Birds?

     that's right

8.7.18  9:01 pm   what does nsfw stand for?

     nylon stockings for women

8.7.18  8:36 pm   How can I help someone to get out of an existential crisis?

     have one yourself and ask them to help you out of it. that will get them out of it

8.7.18  8:24 pm   A lot of your songs reference coming home (or not being able to) and things being okay. Is there a deeper meaning behind your lyrical themes like this?

     deeper than what

8.7.18  8:20 pm   besides making great videos and music, do u have another job?

     not right now

8.7.18  8:13 pm   can u define time and space?

     that's all anybody does

8.7.18  8:11 pm   what is the worst place to buy cardboard

     on the dark web

8.7.18  7:29 pm   If you could, would you become a fish?

     not right now

8.7.18  6:06 pm   when will you be done?

     later

8.7.18  5:47 pm   Do you feel happy given you're getting to do a lot more of what you want to do (longer videos, songs, making music and videos and get response etc)?

     the main problem is i can't do them fast enough

8.7.18  4:32 pm   What is your name?

     george and fred

8.7.18  3:34 pm   So, I can come up with fairly okay solos and stuff to chords singing/humming, but I can't really do that on the piano. I guess I know which note(s) I want, I can hear it in my head, but I can't find it very quickly on the piano? Is this just a "not enough practice" issue?

     yes

8.7.18  2:27 pm   Do your videos suck or are they friggin' awesome?

     hopefully both at the same time

8.7.18  2:21 pm   do you live

     yes

8.7.18  2:18 pm   What's your method on reverb/delay when it comes to vocals? my vocals are either way to dry or drowning in reverb. tell me your secrets

     micro manage when it's there and when it isn't. paint it like a picture.

8.7.18  1:50 pm   life is a quest to turn ? into other stuff.

     that's true

8.7.18  12:48 pm   favorite source of energy?

     the sun

8.7.18  11:29 am   chords for the future song?

     E, Emaj7

8.7.18  10:15 am   Does your sleep cycle vary greatly? (From day to day)

     no but it varies greatly over a longer time scale

8.7.18  9:58 am   what are your thoughts on metaphysics

     seems legit

8.7.18  8:20 am   fuck. what do i do?

     how about a flip

8.7.18  7:40 am   how do you understand what's important to you 

     think about it and experience it, which should come naturally because if it is so important to you you are going to spend a lot of time around it

8.7.18  6:05 am   do you think people's names have affect their personality

     yes

8.7.18  5:59 am   am i a sentient being

     i think so

      and/or does asking that wiestiif n define me as sentient

     it can be a clue

8.7.18  4:49 am   What is the best vacation spot on Earth?

     in the gutter

8.7.18  3:26 am   how do you know all of those songs that you covered in the jazz segment of this site? Do you just look up popular songs and learn a random one by ear?

     all the ones marked "LTR" were done from the real book chart only, never having heard the song prior. most of the ones not marked LTR are songs that i know, usually done from memory without listening

8.7.18  2:42 am   where did my dad go

     out to lunch?

8.7.18  1:38 am   How do you know when something you're working on is done?

     i get to decide

8.7.18  12:42 am   some of your songs are on amazon music and you have to pay for it which I fully support but I don't recall you ever mentioning your music being on amazon, just Spotify and itunes, so I just wanted to make sure you know about it. https://www.amazon.com/s/ref=ntt_srch_drd_B0116K9CP6?ie=UTF8&field-keywords=Bill%20Wurtz&index=digital-music&search-type=ss

     yes, i usually only mention spotify/itunes because those are the top 2 most popular ones. the music is also on google play, youtube music, pandora, tidal, deezer, schleezer, frandoozle, and many more

8.6.18  11:50 pm   8.5.18  5:12 pm i mean re-visit as in making new versions of said songs, re-recording them, or something along those lines.

     that sounds like a good idea except for the fact that i have more songs unrecorded than recorded, so there is never a good time to make that balance even worse than it already is

8.6.18  11:13 pm   bees or beans?

     can you combine the 2 some how

8.6.18  10:56 pm   for the musical sound effects in your videos, such as "soap tips", do you write the sound effects to your voice first before you start editing a video, or do you create the video first and then add the sound effects to it later?

     sounds effects/ score (not the sung parts) is done last

8.6.18  9:57 pm   what's the deal with inverted chords? if you just have a list of chords, how do you know if it was, say, C E G or E G high C?

     check to see what sounds best at that point in the song. or if the boss is there ask them

8.6.18  8:55 pm   Do you have ligma?

     no but i am getting it

8.6.18  7:11 pm   opinions on lasagna?

     so hot
